name: read_MB_json_P1
read_MB_jsonP2
f_update_configP1
f_update_configP2
Minute_Mod
Config_LogFile
func:
let enableLog = msg.enableLog
let Config = global.get("Config")
let SiteName = Config.FTP1.SiteName

if (enableLog === true) {
    let pH = global.get("pH").Value
    let pH_Status = global.get("pH").Status + ""
    let Doduc = global.get("Doduc").Value
    let Doduc_Status = global.get("Doduc").Status + ""

    let Now = global.get("Now")
    let year = Now.Year + ""
    let month = Now.Month + ""
    let day = Now.Day + ""
    let hour = Now.Hour + ""
    let minute = Now.Minute + ""
    let second = Now.Second + ""

    day = checkZero(day);
    month = checkZero(month)
    year = checkZero(year)
    hour = checkZero(hour)
    minute = checkZero(minute)
    second = checkZero(second)

    pH_Status = checkZero(pH_Status)
    Doduc_Status = checkZero(Doduc_Status)

    let logtime = year + month + day +  hour + minute + "00"
    
    let FTPStr = "pH" + "\t" + pH + "\t" + "-" + "\t" + logtime + "\t" + pH_Status + "\r\n" + "Doduc" + "\t" + Doduc + "\t" + "NTU" + "\t" + logtime + "\t" + Doduc_Status + "\r\n"
    
    msg.filename = "C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/Test/FTP1/" + SiteName + "_" + logtime + ".txt"
    msg.payload = FTPStr
    return msg
}

function checkZero(data){
    if (data.length == 1) data = "0" + data
    return data
}

name: Config_Directory
Config_FileUpload
func:
let fileName = msg.fileName
let DateDirectory = msg.DateDirectory
let Config = global.get("Config")
let Host = Config.FTP1.Host
let Port = Config.FTP1.Port
let User = Config.FTP1.User
let Pass = Config.FTP1.Pass
let Directory = Config.FTP1.Directory

msg.payload ="curl -T " + "C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/Test/FTP1/" + fileName + " ftp://" + Host + ":" + Port  + Directory + "/" + DateDirectory + "/" + " --user "+ User + ":" + Pass

return msg

name: Config_MoveFile
func:
fileName = msg.fileName
msg.sourcePath = "C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/Test/FTP1/"
msg.sourceFilename = fileName
msg.destinationPath = "C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/Test/FTP1_Stored/"
msg.destinationFilename = fileName

return msg;

        "Host": "127.0.0.1",

        "Directory": "/tudong/LA",
        "SiteName": "LA_CNLA_NM02",
        "LogTime": 5,

}

    day = checkZero(day);

    hour = checkZero(hour)

name: Get_enableFTP

Now
func:
let Now = {}
Now.Year = new Date().getFullYear()
Now.Month = new Date().getMonth() + 1
Now.Day = new Date().getDate()
Now.Hour = new Date().getHours()
Now.Minute = new Date().getMinutes()
Now.Second = new Date().getSeconds()

global.set("Now",Now)
return msg

name: FileExist?
func:
let Config = global.get("Config")
let Host = Config.FTP1.Host
let Port = Config.FTP1.Port
let User = Config.FTP1.User
let Pass = Config.FTP1.Pass
let Directory = Config.FTP1.Directory

let fileName = msg.fileName
let DateDirectory = msg.DateDirectory

msg.payload =  "curl -I --silent ftp://" + User + ":" + Pass + "@" + Host + ":" + Port + Directory + "/" + DateDirectory + "/" + fileName

return msg
